title: Defender torched in Kuliyapitiya; Three arrested over accident
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police arrested three people in connection with a motor accident involving a motorcycle and a Defender in Kanadulla, Kuliyapitiya on Sunday (1).
Police said that the driver, a teenager (14), and another individual were arrested with regard to the accident that claimed the life of a 39-year-old man.
Following the accident, locals torched the Defender and it was completely destroyed.
